title: Improve Optin Conversion Rates for an Authority Website
snippet:
I am looking for an Email Optin Specialist who will be able to work to increase the optin rates of my large website to greater than 1%.  

We use two software services for collecting email: OptinMonster and Optimize Press.  Must have an in-depth knowledge of OpinMonster and its design - OptimizePress is a bonus.

You should be able to have a strategy in hand to ensure we have the right way of asking for the email and can design high-class top notch optin boxes that fit our brand - so design capability is a must.

Must have an ability to watch the numbers and tweak as necessary in order to improve our optin rates. If you think you're up to the task, reply to this by starting off your reply with hey ninja.  

Must have experience and knowledge with:
1. OptinMonster
2. OptimizePress
